Trade/Device Name(s): FORA D40d Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
FORA Wisdom D40d Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FORA D40d Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
FORA Wisdom D40d Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA D40d and FORA Wisdom D40d systems for combined blood glucose and blood pressure home/professional monitoring
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites and non-invasive monitoring of adult blood pressure and pulse rate; for single-person home use (FORA D40d) and multiple-patient professional settings (FORA Wisdom D40d); not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
